chunk:
Directions: Apply 2-3 drops into palms, warm between hands, & gently press into clean skin. Use AM and PM for best results. Discontinue if irritation occurs.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
